description:
In this course for Visio 2010 you will learn Visio from scratch and become an advanced User in the end.

During the Visio course we support you with professional videos and matching sample files.

First you will learn how to set up your drawing page and apply the basic techniques of stencils and shapes. After you have learnt how to insert, position, align and finally customize drawing elements, you will apply this basic knowledge in order to create a workflow plan and an organization chart with Visio. After the first steps in creating charts you will extend your knowledge of Visio. You will learn how to work with layers and reports. Using different practical examples you will get familiar with the various diagram categories. You will learn how to create flowcharts, vividly visualized network diagrams, database diagrams and diagrams for illustrating project processes. We will also show you how to evaluate external data in Pivot diagrams. Finally you will learn how Visio can support you in planning a website.

Course Duration: 18 - 24 hours
title: Learn Microsoft Visio 2010 -Beginner & Advanced Training-
instructors: LernFilme.com High quality video trainings for workplace learning. LernFilme.com
